import React from 'react' import { Card, Feed } from 'semantic-ui-react' import moment from 'moment' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCoffee } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const CardExampleContentBlock = ({temprature, humidity, city, sunrise, sunset, icon}) => ( {city}
{moment().format('MMMM Do, h:mm a')}
{Math.floor(temprature-273.15)}â„ƒ
{humidity}%
{new Date(sunrise * 1000).toLocaleTimeString("en-EG")}
{new Date(sunset * 1000).toLocaleTimeString("en-EG")}
) export default CardExampleContentBlock
